description: Snap Dragons were extremely dangerous because of their volatile nature. It was so easy to send one of these monsters into a fury that Deku Scrubs would occasionally rile them up before sending them to a fight. A worked up Snap Dragon became so hellbent on ripping apart its target that nothing to halt it.
